overview.description: State Transfer is a periodic event (not always available) that runs for 7 days in three phases. Available after the state has FC5 unlocked. Events run approximately every 4-6 weeks.
overview.announcement_lead_time: 3-4 days before event starts (in-game mail and X/Twitter)

event_phases.name: Pre-Transfer (Presidential Review)
event_phases.description: State Presidents set Power Cap thresholds. Chiefs browse eligible states and contact Presidents. No transfers happen yet.

event_phases.name: Invitational Transfer
event_phases.description: Presidents send invitations (Ordinary or Special) to Chiefs. Invited Chiefs can transfer.

event_phases.name: Open Transfer
event_phases.description: Any eligible Chief meeting the Power Cap can transfer freely on a first-come, first-served basis.

transfer_passes.debunked_claim: The '4 passes' claim is incorrect — 4 is just a pack size ($49.99 for 4 passes)
transfer_passes.calculation: Based on player's Transfer Score vs target state's Transfer Rating
transfer_score_excludes: Troop Power (troops can be dismissed but score stays the same)
transfer_passes.state_transfer_rating: Sum of Transfer Scores from the top 100 active chiefs in that state
transfer_passes.rough_formula: ~1 pass per 20M Transfer Score points (exact formula not published)

f2p_low_spender.notes: Most common range. Sources say unlikely to exceed 10

absolute_range.notes: Some sources say up to 75 for extreme cases

alliance_transfers.description: There is NO alliance transfer feature. Each member must transfer individually.
coordination_steps: Every member must leave the alliance before transferring
Each member needs their own Transfer Passes
Each member must individually meet all requirements
After transferring, members rejoin or create a new alliance in the destination state

personal.furnace_level: Must reach the required minimum (varies by state age, max is F30)
personal.power_cap: Must not exceed the President's set Power Cap (unless Special Invite)
personal.alliance_membership: Must NOT be in any alliance at time of transfer
personal.combat_status: City cannot be in active combat or scouting

state_compatibility.hero_generation: Origin and target state must have the same latest hero generation
state_compatibility.equipment_systems: Chief and hero equipment must match
state_compatibility.state_age: Character creation age cannot exceed target state age by more than 45-180 days (varies by bracket)
state_compatibility.transfer_groups: States assigned to 1 of 12 groups. Can only transfer within your group — no exceptions.

what_you_lose.resources: Resources exceeding Storehouse Protection limit are LOST
what_you_lose.event_progress: Active events terminated; unclaimed rewards mailed
what_you_lose.chat_groups: All group chats removed (friends and private chats preserved)
what_you_lose.alliance: Must leave before transferring; lose alliance shop progress
what_you_lose.pack_purchase_counts: RESET (actually a benefit — you can rebuy packs)
what_you_lose.emporium_of_enigma: Thorns transfer only if Emporium is active in new state; otherwise removed
